primary.context: The caller wants to terminate their ownership of the timeshare.
primary.detail: The AI correctly identified the request as out-of-scope and attempted a transfer, but no human agents were available, leading the caller to hang up after a long wait.

steps: Caller requested concierge to discuss ending ownership.
AI attempted to transfer but encountered a long queue.
AI re-engaged after 25 minutes to offer general info since no agents were available.
Caller declined AI assistance and asked for a callback.
AI informed caller it cannot arrange callbacks and suggested calling back later.

actions.detail: Attempted transfer to concierge; no agents available after long wait.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to end their timeshare ownership, which is an out-of-scope task. The AI attempted a transfer, but due to high call volume and no available agents, the caller eventually disconnected after being told a callback was not possible.
insights.verbatim: I'm calling about our timeshare. We want to no longer have ownership over it.
insights.coaching: The agent performed well by identifying the out-of-scope request and attempting a transfer; however, the 25-minute hold time before re-engaging is a system-level friction point.
